text: Aspergillus crustosus is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Aenei section. The species was first described in 1965.Raper, K.B.; Fennell, D.I. 1965. The Genus Aspergillus. :1-686 It has been reported to produce PR-toxin. ==Growth and morphology== A. crustosus has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below. Aspergillus_crustosus_cya.png|Aspergillus crustosus growing on CYA plate Aspergillus_crustosus_meaox.png|Aspergillus crustosus growing on MEAOX plate == References == crustosus Category:Fungi described in 1965
title: Aspergillus crustosus
